price: 42. Mpe ya soló, tosilaki kotinda(1) epai ya bato liboso nayo, na sima tozuaki bango na bampasi ya makasi nzala mpe bamalali ya makasi mpo ete ntango mosusu bakolomba (ngolu na biso).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَضَرَّعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
